script:
1). Excuse me, could you tell me how to get to the Center Building?
Sure. Go two blocks and turn left. 
It's downtown near the library.
It's about three miles from here.
2). Do I need to return Ms. Phelps' phone call?
Yes, you don't need to call her.
No, you don't. She'll call later. 
Yes, you do need to call him.
3). Why are we stopping at the library?
Yes, I love the library too!
We?ll stop there at 3 o'clock.
I need to return some books.
